summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.1°C) and outside temperature (down 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1420 m), feels like temperature (up 6.1°C), and outside temperature (up 4.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 720.4m lower than yesterday, 561.3m lower than the past week, 1420.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1266.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Possible light showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dark. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
